name: Stun Gun
help:
Delivers an attack to all nearby enemies with a potency of 1,000 for the first enemy, 25% less for the second, 50% less for the third, and 75% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Stun
Duration: 2s
Overheats Gauss Barrel upon execution.

â€»This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
